name: NewMusic
0:
”Alexa, ask New Music what song i should listen to.”
”Alexa, ask New Music to suggest a new song.”
”Alexa, ask New Music to give me a song.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: new music
des: When in need of more music, ask New Music! New Music has 500+ song suggestions for you. Add these songs to your playlist or explore different genres. The app does not play the song, as some may have explicit language. It suggests songs for your personal enjoyment.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
